identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a futuristic, automotive-grade Supercharger Explorer that feels like a native Tesla interface.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Automotive HUD precision with SaaS usability.
Emotion First: Evoke 'Range Confidence' and 'High-Tech Efficiency'.
Content is King: The Map is the hero; UI floats above it.
Zoom In: Focus on charger availability and amenities.
Negative Space: Don't clutter the map view.

layout.container_style: Fluid Map Background with Floating Panels

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full font-bold tracking-wide shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(232,33,39,0.4)] transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary/10 text-secondary hover:bg-secondary/20 border border-secondary/20 rounded-full font-medium backdrop-blur-md

cards.glass: bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl rounded-xl

inputs.default: bg-zinc-950/50 border-zinc-800 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-lg text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600

map_markers.available: w-8 h-8 bg-green-500 rounded-full border-2 border-white shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(34,197,94,0.6)]
map_markers.busy: w-8 h-8 bg-yellow-500 rounded-full border-2 border-white shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(234,179,8,0.6)]
map_markers.offline: w-8 h-8 bg-zinc-500 rounded-full border-2 border-white

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Barlow Condensed' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts immediately.
2. MAP FIRST: The map is the background. All UI elements must float over it using absolute positioning and z-index.
3. DARK MODE ONLY: Force dark mode in tailwind config or html class. This app is for in-car use.
4. GLASS PANELS: Use the 'glass' card style for the sidebar and details panel. Do not use solid opaque backgrounds for main containers.
5. INTERACTIVE MARKERS: Map markers must be interactive. Clicking one opens the details panel.
6. ROUTE LINE: Use a bright, glowing line (Cyan or Blue) for the route path on the map.
7. USE SHADCN: Use Shadcn components for complex interactions (Sheet, Dialog, Slider) but style them with the glass theme.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, markers).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
No Gradients on Text: Keep text legible.
Micro-interactions: Hover states must be obvious (scale, brightness, glow).
Spacing: Use p-6 or p-8 inside cards. Don't cram content.
Accessibility: Ensure high contrast for text on glass backgrounds.
